description: portrait of Adrien van Ostade in center oval, facing right looking back left; bust; wearing tall black hat, flat white collar; at left painting of an interior; at right several paintings in a stack; swag across top; pedestal across bottom
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

below image in plate in black: ADRIEN ET ISAAC \\ VAN \\ OSTAD \\ ÉLEVES DE FRANÇOIS HALS | on sheet in pencil: 2-147
title: Adrien and Isaac van Ostade, Students of Franz Hals
